verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> copied <S%H6275>out.<s%>
It is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H5641>conceal<s%> a <S%H1697>thing:<s%> but the <S%H3519>honor<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is to search <S%H2713>out<s%> a <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7312>height,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6011>depth,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is <S%H369>unsearchable.<s%> <S%H2714><s%>
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H5509>dross<s%> from the <S%H4480>silver,<s%> <S%H3701><s%> and there shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> for the <S%H6884>refiner.<s%>
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
Put not forth <S%H408>thyself<s%> <S%H1921><s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> men:

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> it is that it be <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2008>hither;<s%> than that thou shouldest be put <S%H4480>lower<s%> <S%H8213><s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

Go not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H4118>hastily<s%> to <S%H7378>strive,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou know not <S%H4100>what<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof, when thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> hath put thee to <S%H3637>shame.<s%> <S%H853><s%>
Debate <S%H7378><s%> thy <S%H7379>cause<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> himself; and <S%H1540>discover<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a <S%H5475>secret<s%> to another: <S%H312><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> he that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> it put thee to <S%H2616>shame,<s%> and thine <S%H1681>infamy<s%> turn not <S%H3808>away.<s%> <S%H7725><s%>
A <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H5921>fitly<s%> <S%H655><s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is like <S%H8598>apples<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in <S%H4906>pictures<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

As an <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and an <S%H2481>ornament<s%> of fine <S%H3800>gold,<s%> so is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3198>reprover<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> an <S%H8085>obedient<s%> <S%H241>ear.<s%>

As the <S%H6793>cold<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> so is a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>messenger<s%> to them that <S%H7971>send<s%> him: for he <S%H7725>refresheth<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H113>masters.<s%>
Whoso <S%H376><s%> boasteth <S%H1984>himself<s%> of a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H4991>gift<s%> is like <S%H5387>clouds<s%> and <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H1653>rain.<s%>
By <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H639>forbearing<s%> is a <S%H7101>prince<s%> <S%H6601>persuaded,<s%> and a <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H7665>breaketh<s%> the <S%H1634>bone.<s%>
Hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1706>honey?<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> so much as is <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for thee, <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou be <S%H7646>filled<s%> therewith, and <S%H6958>vomit<s%> it.
Withdraw <S%H3365><s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H4480>house;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he be <S%H7646>weary<s%> of thee, and so <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee.

A <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H6030>beareth<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> is a <S%H4650>maul,<s%> and a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and a <S%H8150>sharp<s%> <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>

Confidence <S%H4009><s%> in an unfaithful <S%H898>man<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> is like a <S%H7465>broken<s%> <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> and a <S%H7272>foot<s%> out of <S%H4154>joint.<s%>

As he that taketh <S%H5710>away<s%> a <S%H899>garment<s%> in <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>weather,<s%> and as <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H5427>niter,<s%> so is he that <S%H7891>singeth<s%> <S%H7892>songs<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> a <S%H7451>heavy<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thine <S%H8130>enemy<s%> be <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> give him <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> give him <S%H4325>water<s%> to drink: <S%H8248><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H2846>heap<s%> coals of <S%H1513>fire<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7999>reward<s%> thee.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> driveth <S%H2342>away<s%> <S%H1653>rain:<s%> so doth an <S%H2194>angry<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%> a <S%H5643>backbiting<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>housetop,<s%> than with a brawling <S%H4480>woman<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H4079><s%> and in a <S%H2267>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

As <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> a <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> so is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from a far <S%H4480>country.<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H4801><s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man falling <S%H4131>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is as a <S%H7515>troubled<s%> <S%H4599>fountain,<s%> and a <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H4726>spring.<s%>
It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H1706>honey:<s%> so for men to <S%H2714>search<s%> their own <S%H3519>glory<s%> is not <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

He <S%H376><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H369>no<s%> rule <S%H4623>over<s%> his own <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is like a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is broken <S%H6555>down,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H2346>walls.<s%>
